mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.S_NO, B.S_NAME, C.CODENAME AS S_TYPE FROM THISCART A LEFT JOIN TMSTSTAY B ON A.S_NO = B.S_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTCODE C ON C.GRPCODE = 3 AND B.S_TYPE = C.CODE WHERE A.M_NO = #{param1} ORDER BY A.S_NO ASC
SELECT B.R_NO, B.R_NAME, B.R_PRICE FROM THISCART A LEFT JOIN TMSTROOM B ON A.S_NO = B.S_NO AND A.R_NO = B.R_NO WHERE A.M_NO = #{param1} AND A.S_NO = #{param2} ORDER BY A.S_NO
